{
    "number": 163157,
    "data": "2,3,7,41,1871,4599466948725481982057,153554501132879618787551305057",
    "name": "Primes of the form 1 + some Golden Rectangle Number.",
    "comment": [
        "Primes of the form 1+A001654(k) for some k, as actually generated by k=1, 2, 3, 5, 9, 53, 71,....",
        "Also primes of the form Fibonacci(k)*Fibonacci(k+1)+1. - _Colin Barker_, Apr 08 2016"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "q=0;lst={};Do[f=Fibonacci[n];If[PrimeQ[f*q+1],AppendTo[lst,f*q+1]];q=f, {n,3*6!}];lst"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) for(k=1, 1000, if(isprime(p=fibonacci(k)*fibonacci(k+1)+1), print1(p, \",\"))) \\\\ _Colin Barker_, Apr 08 2016"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A001654, A000045, A163154, A163155, A163156."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 21 2009",
    "ext": [
        "Slightly edited by _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 25 2009"
    ],
    "references": 2,
    "revision": 7,
    "time": "2016-04-08T08:44:26-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
